Rule: {(int(REF2("BUS_DT").split('-')[0]) > 1677 and int(REF2("BUS_DT").split('-')[0]) < 2262) if DATEFORMAT(REF2("BUS_DT"), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S") else False}
Comment: BUS_DT is not the correct date format

Comment: PD cannot be empty and 0 <= PD <= 1 Êwhen BSL_CREDIT_RISK_APPROACH = FIRB or AIRB
